promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young basic lizard water-type pokemon holding a dark mace. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Macequatic, a a young basic lizard water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Dive, Lap Up. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lizard", "water" or "Macequatic". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, lizard-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, teal and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: "Found in flowing habitats, this playful reptile excels at diving for river fruits and sips dew with its long tongue."
